name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-proactive-installation-csharp
title: Proactive Installation Sample App
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates proactive installation of a Teams app and sending notifications to users using Microsoft Graph APIs.
longDescription: This sample app illustrates proactive installation of a Microsoft Teams application and the ability to send proactive notifications to users within a Group Chat or Channel through the Microsoft Graph API. It features a bot integration, ensuring seamless interaction and enhanced user experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing proactive installation sample app
